Articles.Content: Yea that seems to happen to me...

Speaking of war effort, if you checked the Politics and War forum, in the "War $ loss not accumulating" thread (started by me), you can find why for some of you when opening the timeline of a war when you are combatant of that war the war $ loss is not accumulating... until Sheepy fixes it few days before. I found it hilarious, even though me and a few others are affected.

Also, 50 infrastructure is required to build an improvement, and power is required for pretty much the rightmost 16 improvements. Also to lower disease rate buy more land or build a hospital. I think the hard part is building a nation from scratch, especially with only one city to start with. It took me some time to get used to the game mechanics.. Once you have two or more cities things get a little bit easier. At least I think so.
I have joined the alliance, my country is Russia SFSR.
I sent my application for the alliance. I may have built 4 farms.

Alright, things are settled, then.

I was worried about spies in our alliances.

@CornHuskerKenny: You must be the Corn republic. I'll accept the application.

But... who are Napoleon VII and AngrySheep?

EDIT: Built a uranium mine today. Still trying to make enough money to get enough aluminum and to get enough cash, although I can sell a hospital.

Edited April 5, 2014 by Designer225
I am not sure if I should join... I sed to be in BLOC with you guys.

OK, everyone, here's a controversial issue in the P&W forum. http://politicsandwar.com/forums/index.php?/topic/1297-inactive-treaty/

I find the points of >BLOC disagreeable.

Also, setting up an IRC channel for our alliance, just so that we could communicate "live" rather than posting in here continuously and wasting several thread pages.

Edited April 5, 2014 by Designer225
My country is nearing its 100 day anniversary tomorrow ,and so far been constructing more infastructure for a super market which I had sold to get a recycle center.

OK, everyone, here's a controversial issue in the P&W forum. http://politicsandwar.com/forums/index.php?/topic/1297-inactive-treaty/

I find the points of >BLOC disagreeable.

Just point and laugh, and realize that this is exactly the same kind of banter that goes on during real discussions between politicians, only... the internet discussions are probably more mature.

Edited April 7, 2014 by vger
How do I play this game? The documentation in wiki is lacking and there isn't any getting started guide
Hi Aghanim. May I ask, have you formed a nation yet? If so, what's the name and what have you done in the game so far? Knowing this I can probably help suggesting first or next steps.

the country Seahorse Toenail led by Pubstomper has declared war on Futuria, and myself, Phlalchas. I fought back and reduced their forces a bit, but it's going to take a lot to wear down 80 tanks.

Any help is appreciated.
update: the country Gopheria in the same alliance as Seahorse has joined the fight. Futuria and I have been airstruck. Again, any help is appreciated.
As such a young country, I have no forces to speak of. But I'll put a stop to my daily trading and stockpile as much food as I can in case you need it.
Thanks. Food is appreciated. Check your inbox, I am CCing a message to all alliance.
Your in-game inbox, I mean. Sorry
Well i am under attack ,and the war front is going any better.
The front line has improved some, but we sorely need to build up. Raid some inactive nations, they are really a great source of income. I'll keep you posted.
I got some munitions I can spare, but the countries that are attacking are outside of my war range...
Well Im screwed my infrastructure is at 9 out of 11 buildings
mine was like 2/7 once
Much to the dismay of my minions, (who were hoping for some medical relief) plans for a new hospital have shifted over to iron with the intention of starting steel production for the war effort.
Well the battlefront is going very bad ,and im going to lose the battle.After this im going to start producing lots of steel ,and food.Then focus on a second city.

I have to spend all my money to prepare for a mechanized army. I still couldn't fight with the top ones, despite them being able to wage war on you. I'm however, considering opening a new front on some of the nations that I can fight against.

I have to spend all my money to prepare for a mechanized army. I still couldn't fight with the top ones, despite them being able to wage war on you. I'm however, considering opening a new front on some of the nations that I can fight against.

Nations in the warring alliances, or just ANY nation?
